page.title: 11CEMETERY
page.content:
{ It was a very gloomy day.We went to the cemetery to have a look at the gravestones.I felt very sorry for the relatives of the people who had died. The graves differed. Some were immaculate,some were just a little wooden cross,some were neglected and overgrown.Thinking ahead one hundred years,the headstone may disintegrate and you may not know it is a grave unless you dig and find a body.
As soon as I walked through the tall metal gates I felt a sudden silence fall around me and a saddnes filled the air.All I could see on the horizon was gravestones.I walked past one,it was grim and old.They were all different shapes and sizes.I saw a stone with a beautiful angel carved on,another,two cheap pieces of wood.
